original: des gsang sngags kyi don bskyed rim pa dang / rdzogs rim gzhan gyi rgyud las skyed par byed pa'o //
analyzed: des gsang sngags kyi don bskyed rim pa dang / rdzogs rim gzhan gyi rgyud las skyed par byed pa'o //
translated: That generates the meaning of the secret mantra, the generation stage, and the completion stage of other tantras.

original: don dam par thig chos nyid mi 'gyur ba la /
analyzed: don dam par thig chos nyid mi 'gyur ba la /
translated: In ultimate reality, the bindu is the unchanging dharmatā.

original: le khyab cing gdal ba ste /
analyzed: le khyab cing gdal ba ste /
translated: The bindu is all-pervading and infinite.

original: ngo bo tshig gis brjod du med pa'o ;
analyzed: ngo bo tshig gis brjod du med pa'o ;
translated: The essence is inexpressible with words.

original: / stong pa chen po chos kyi sku de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon yi ge ma 'gags par shar ba ni //
analyzed: / stong pa chen po chos kyi sku de nyid las de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i sa bon yi ge ma 'gags par shar ba ni //

original: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom a'a: h'um sv'a h'a /
translated: They are oṃ, āḥ, hūṃ, svā, and ha.

original: de lnga'o / //
analyzed: de lnga'o / //
translated: Those are the five.

original: / thig le skye ba med pa de las yi ge brgya ste /
analyzed: / thig le skye ba med pa de las yi ge brgya ste /
translated: The one hundred letters arise from the bindu of nonarising.

original: de la brten nas sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: de la brten nas sgrub thabs sna tshogs 'byung ba ste /
translated: The various sādhanas arise based on that.

original: don du na chos kyi sku la phyogs ris med cing 'gag pa med pa'i mthu'o //
analyzed: don du na chos kyi sku la phyogs ris med cing 'gag pa med pa'i mthu'o //
translated: In fact, the dharmakāya is without bias and has the power of being unceasing.

original: 'on thugs kyi sprul pa gang zhe na //
analyzed: 'on thugs kyi sprul pa gang zhe na //
translated: If it is asked what is the emanation of mind,

original: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
analyzed: rnam pa kun ldan rnam pa med //
translated: it has all aspects and is without aspects.

original: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
analyzed: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le can //
translated: It has the bindu of half of the sixteenth.

original: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
analyzed: yan lag med pa'i rtsis las 'das //
translated: It is beyond the enumeration of the formless.

original: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi yi rtse mo can //
translated: It has the peak of the four meditative concentrations.

original: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
analyzed: bsam gtan yan lag kun shes shing //
translated: He knows all the branches of meditation,

original: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa //🔽zhes smos te /
analyzed: ting 'dzin rig dang rgyud rig pa // zhes smos te /
translated: and is aware of samadhi and the tantras.

original: kun rdzob tu mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs te snod bcud kyi rnam pa kun dang ldan la /
analyzed: kun rdzob tu mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs te snod bcud kyi rnam pa kun dang ldan la /
translated: He is endowed with all the aspects of the world and its inhabitants, such as the major and minor marks, in the relative.

original: don dam par snang ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
analyzed: don dam par snang ba'i ngo bo nyid med do //
translated: In the ultimate, he has no nature of appearance.

original: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gi phyed yi ge brgyad yin la /
analyzed: dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug gi phyed yi ge brgyad yin la /
translated: The sixteen vowels are the eight syllables.

original: brgyad kyi phyed bzhi yin te /
analyzed: brgyad kyi phyed bzhi yin te /
translated: The eight are the four.

original: aa a'a aam aa:/
analyzed: aa a'a aam aa:/
translated: A ā am āḥ.

original: zhes pa'o // de bzhi ni mtshon byed du byung ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa'o // de bzhi ni mtshon byed du byung ba yin te /
translated: Those four are what arise as the illustrators.

original: de bzhis ci mtshon na /
analyzed: de bzhis ci mtshon na /
translated: What do those four illustrate?

original: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi mtshon te /
analyzed: rnam par thar ba'i sgo bzhi mtshon te /
translated: They illustrate the four doors of liberation.

original: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyi rnam par thar pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa'o //
translated: The liberation of emptiness, the liberation of signlessness, the liberation of wishlessness, and the liberation of skill in means.

original: de yang stong pa nyid kyis ni dngos po las 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: de yang stong pa nyid kyis ni dngos po las 'byin par byed do //
translated: Moreover, emptiness liberates from entities.

original: mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma phra mo'i zhen pa las kyang 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pas ni mtshan ma phra mo'i zhen pa las kyang 'byin par byed do //
translated: The absence of signs causes one to be freed from even the most subtle clinging to signs.

original: smon pa med pas ni 'bras bu re smon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa las 'byin par byed do //
analyzed: smon pa med pas ni 'bras bu re smon gyi mtha' la dmigs pa las 'byin par byed do //
translated: The absence of expectancy causes one to be freed from the extreme of hoping for a result.

original: thabs la mkhas pas ni thabs dman zhing mi mkhas pa rnams las 'byin par byed @32b do ;
analyzed: thabs la mkhas pas ni thabs dman zhing mi mkhas pa rnams las 'byin par byed @32b do ;
translated: Skill in means causes one to be freed from inferior and unskilled means.

original: / de bzhin yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis /
analyzed: / de bzhin yang spros pa phyogs re bcad pa'i yon tan gyi cha nas bzhir bshad kyis /
translated: In the same way, the four are explained from the perspective of the qualities of having eliminated certain aspects of conceptual elaborations.

original: don du na thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: don du na thig le chen po yi ge med pa'o //
translated: In actuality, they are the great sphere without syllables.

original: yang spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na byang chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu gnas te /
analyzed: yang spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na byang chub kyi sems thig le cha bcu drug tu gnas te /
translated: In the great-bliss chakra at the crown, the bodhicitta abides in sixteen parts.

original: de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brten te /
analyzed: de las kyi phyag rgya'i thabs kyi bye brag rnams la brten te /
translated: In dependence on the various methods of the karma consort,

original: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i thig le bcu drug po bzhu ba'i phyed brgyad snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor phab /
analyzed: spyi bo bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo'i thig le bcu drug po bzhu ba'i phyed brgyad snying ga chos kyi 'khor lor phab /
translated: half of the sixteen drops of the great-bliss chakra at the crown melt and descend to the dharma chakra at the heart.

original: de bzhu ba'i phyed lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor phab /
analyzed: de bzhu ba'i phyed lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lor phab /
translated: Half of that melts and descends to the emanation chakra at the navel.

original: de'i phyir gsang ba bde skyong gi 'khor lor phab ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gsang ba bde skyong gi 'khor lor phab ste /
translated: Therefore, it is brought down to the secret wheel that protects bliss.

original: gnyis shos gnyis mnyam gyi dus su dngos gzung ngo //
analyzed: gnyis shos gnyis mnyam gyi dus su dngos gzung ngo //
translated: It is actually apprehended at the time of the union of two-and-a-half-aggregates.

original: de yang dang yang du goms par byas bas mthar de'i zhen pa bag tsam dang yang bral te /
analyzed: de yang dang yang du goms par byas bas mthar de'i zhen pa bag tsam dang yang bral te /
translated: By becoming familiar with that again and again, finally one becomes free from even the slightest clinging to that.

original: thig le chen po yi ge med pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thig le chen po yi ge med pa rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: One realizes the great drop without syllables.

original: de yang 'di skad du /
analyzed: de yang 'di skad du /
translated: That is stated as follows:

original: zab mo rnam par thar pa bzhis //
analyzed: zab mo rnam par thar pa bzhis //
translated: The four profound doors of liberation

original: rnon pa'i don du bshad pa yin //🔽'khor lo bzhin du bskor byed pa //
analyzed: rnon pa'i don du bshad pa yin // 'khor lo bzhin du bskor byed pa //
translated: are explained for the sake of the sharp.🔽One should understand that which turns

original: rtul po'i don du shes par bya //
analyzed: rtul po'i don du shes par bya //
translated: like a wheel for the sake of the dull.

original: zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ngo //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de ltar bsgoms pas rnam rtog gyi yan lag med pa /
analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pas rnam rtog gyi yan lag med pa /
translated: By meditating in that way, one is without the branches of discursive thought,

original: brjod pa'i rtsis las 'das pa'o //
analyzed: brjod pa'i rtsis las 'das pa'o //
translated: and one is beyond the calculation of expression.

original: ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lta'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin bzang ba ni bsam gtan bzhi la lta'i ting nge 'dzin lta bu'o //
translated: Good meditative stabilization is like the meditative stabilization of the four meditative concentrations.

original: nyid kyang de dang dang zhing gzhan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes te /
analyzed: nyid kyang de dang dang zhing gzhan gyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gtan gyi yan lag rnams kyang shes te /
translated: One also has clarity with that, and one knows the branches of meditative stabilization and meditative concentration of others.

original: de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag mthong shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
analyzed: de yang 'dod pa'i khams na lhag mthong shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
translated: Furthermore, he knows the meditative absorption that is predominant in insight in the desire realm.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na zhi gnas shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na zhi gnas shas che ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes pa'o //
translated: He knows the meditative absorption that is predominant in serenity in the formless realm.

original: gzugs kyi khams na zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes te /
analyzed: gzugs kyi khams na zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i bsam gtan kyang shes te /
translated: He knows the meditative absorption that is a union of serenity and insight in the form realm.

original: de la bsam gtan bzhi la yan lag bco brgyad de /
analyzed: de la bsam gtan bzhi la yan lag bco brgyad de /
translated: In this regard, the four meditative absorptions have eighteen aspects.

original: bsam gtan dang po la yang yan lag lnga ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po la yang yan lag lnga ste /
translated: The first meditative absorption has five aspects:

original: rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtog pa dang / dpyod pa dang / dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: initial mental application, sustained mental application, joy, bliss, and one-pointed focus of the mind.

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /
translated: The second meditative absorption has four aspects:

original: dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / nang rab tu dang ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / nang rab tu dang ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: joy, bliss, internal clarity, and one-pointed focus of the mind.

original: bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste /
analyzed: bsam gtan gsum pa la yang yan lag lnga ste /
translated: The third meditative absorption has five aspects:

original: btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: btang snyoms dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / bde ba dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: equanimity, mindfulness, introspection, bliss, and one-pointed focus of the mind.

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste /🔽btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa dang / bde ba yang ma @33a * //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang yan lag bzhi ste / btang snyoms yongs su dag pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa dang / bde ba yang ma @33a * //
translated: The fourth meditative concentration also has four branches:

original: yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
analyzed: yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba yongs su dag pa dang / sems rtse gcig pa nyid do //
translated: complete purity of equanimity, complete purity of mindfulness, complete purity of the feeling that is neither pleasure nor pain and one-pointedness of mind.

original: de rnams rje btsun nyid kyis shes pa'o //
analyzed: de rnams rje btsun nyid kyis shes pa'o //
translated: The venerable one knows these.

original: gzhan dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin chen phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bskyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ; zla ba'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa ting nge 'dzin brgya rtsa gcig kyang mkhyen cing /

translated: He also knows the one hundred and one meditative concentrations, such as the heroic progress meditative concentration, the precious seal meditative concentration, the lion’s sport meditative concentration and the glorious banner of the moon meditative concentration.

original: gang zag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang skye gnas kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa rnams kyang ri gcing mkhyen no //
analyzed: gang zag gi bsam pa dang bag la nyal dang skye gnas kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa rnams kyang ri gcing mkhyen no //
translated: He also knows the thoughts, latent tendencies and birth processes of individuals.

analyzed: 'o na longs sku'i mtshan pa ci zhe na /
translated: What are the signs of the enjoyment body?

analyzed: ting nge 'dzin lus can lus kyi mchog / longs spyod rdzogs sku kun gyi rgyal // zhes smos te /
translated: The concentration body is the supreme body of all bodies, the king of all enjoyment bodies.

original: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku ste /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin lus can ni chos kyi sku ste /
translated: The concentration body is the Dharma body.

original: sku de gnyis kyi rten byed cing mchog tu gyur pa de ni gzhi'o //
analyzed: sku de gnyis kyi rten byed cing mchog tu gyur pa de ni gzhi'o //
translated: The basis is that which serves as the support for those two bodies and is supreme.

original: de las theg pa chen po'i chos la longs spyod pa sku rnam par snang mdzad du snang ste /
analyzed: de las theg pa chen po'i chos la longs spyod pa sku rnam par snang mdzad du snang ste /
translated: From that, the enjoyment of the Dharma of the Great Vehicle appears as the body of Vairocana.

original: de yang nges pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bur bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: de yang nges pa lnga dang ldan zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lta bur bzhugs pa ste /
translated: That is endowed with the five certainties and exists like a universal monarch.

original: de yang // thig chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
analyzed: de yang // thig chen nye bar longs spyod phyir //
translated: Because it enjoys the great elements,

original: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur 'dod //
analyzed: thub pa'i longs spyod rdzogs skur 'dod //
translated: the Sage’s enjoyment body is asserted.

original: ces pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: ces pa lta bu'o //
translated: And

translated: that enjoyment body turns the wheel of Dharma for the principal bodhisattvas on the tenth level through the purity of its deeds and conduct.

original: de la sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad spyod ci zhe na /
analyzed: de la sprul pa'i sku'i mdzad spyod ci zhe na /
translated: What are the deeds and conduct of the emanation body?

analyzed: sprul pa'i sku ste sku yi mchog / sangs rgyas sprul pa'i rgyud 'chang ba //
translated: the cause of the emanation of the buddhas.

analyzed: phyogs bcur sprul pa sna tshogs 'gyed // ji bzhin 'gro ba'i don byed pa //
translated: It emanates various emanations in the ten directions.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: It acts for the welfare of living beings in accordance with their needs.

original: de yang rgyal ba sprul pa'i sku ni /
analyzed: de yang rgyal ba sprul pa'i sku ni /
translated: The emanation body of the victors

original: 'khor rigs drug gi sems can dang / nyan thos dang / rang rgyal ba rnams la gsung gi mdzad spyod rnam par dag pa'i sgo nas chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar mdzad de /

analyzed: sprul sku ma dag pa las mchog tu gyur pa sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs /
translated: The emanation body that is superior to the impure emanation body is the buddha Vipaśyin.

analyzed: gtsug tor can la sogs pa sangs rgyas stong rtsa gnyis kyi rgyud du sprul pa'o //

analyzed: sprul nas gang du 'gyed na phyogs bcur 'gyed do //
translated: Having emanated, it emanates in the ten directions.

analyzed: bskye nas ci byed na ji ltar 'tsham pa ltar 'gro ba'i don byed pa'o //
translated: Having been born, it acts for the welfare of living beings in accordance with their needs.

original: 'o na ma dag pa'i sprul sku gang zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ma dag pa'i sprul sku gang zhe na /
translated: What is the impure emanation body?

original: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
analyzed: lha yi dbang po lha yi lha //
translated: The lord of gods is the god of gods.

original: lha yi bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
analyzed: lha yi bdag po lha min bdag /'chi med dbang po lha yi bla //
translated: The lord of the gods, the lord of the demigods, the lord of immortality, the supreme god,

analyzed: 'joms @33b byed 'joms byed dbang phyug po //
translated: the destroyer, the destroyer, the lord.

original: zhes smos te /
analyzed: zhes smos te /
translated: Thus it is said.

analyzed: lha'i dbang po ste khyab 'jug gis 'dul ba la khyab 'jug tu sprul lo /

original: lha'i lha ni tshangs pa'o //
analyzed: lha'i lha ni tshangs pa'o //
translated: The god of gods is Brahma.

analyzed: lha'i bdag po ni brgya byin no // lha min bdag ni thags bzangs ris so //
translated: The lord of the gods is Indra.🔽The lord of the demigods is Vemacitra.

analyzed: 'chi med dbang po ni 'thab bral la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po rnams so //

analyzed: lha'i bla ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed la sogs pa'i lha'i rgyal po'o //

original: 'joms byed ni drag po 'jigs byed do //
analyzed: 'joms byed ni drag po 'jigs byed do //

original: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni ma h'a de ba'o //
analyzed: 'joms byed dbang phyug ni ma h'a de ba'o //
translated: The lord of the destroyer is Mahādeva.

original: de rnams kyis 'dul ba la de rnams su sprul nas don mdzad do //
analyzed: de rnams kyis 'dul ba la de rnams su sprul nas don mdzad do //
translated: Having emanated as those for those to be tamed by them, he acts for their benefit.

original: chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshul ni /
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin pa'i tshul ni /
translated: The way of the gift of Dharma is as follows:

original: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
analyzed: srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal ba //
translated: Having crossed the wilderness of existence,

original: ston pa gcig bu 'gro ba'i bla //
analyzed: ston pa gcig bu 'gro ba'i bla //
translated: the sole teacher, the lord of beings,

original: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
analyzed: 'jig rten phyogs bcur rab grags pa //
translated: renowned in the ten directions of the world,

original: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po //🔽byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
analyzed: chos kyi sbyin bdag che ba po // byams pa'i go cha chas pa ste //
